import React from 'react' import { removeProductFromCart } from '../features/cartSlice' const CardTemplate = ({key, imgsrc, id, productName, productVersion, productPrice}) => { if (!key, imgsrc, productName, productVersion, productPrice) return 'loading' return ( <>
{productName}

{productVersion}

{/*
{`${productPrice}/- Rs`}
dispatch(removeProductFromCart(id))/>
*/}
) } export default CardTemplate
